fullplot: A writer is interviewing prostitutes, porn stars and gigolos for her latest book. Meanwhile, in Los Angeles, the scholarship of the student of PHD of anthropology Rebecca finishes and she has financial problem to keep her apartment. Her neighbor and call-girl Adrianna introduces her to prostitution.
plot: An anthropology student exploring the nature of prostitution is drawn deeper into that profession than she ever expected.
title: The Life: What's Your Pleasure?
